summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeMorphe's Definer Dual-Ended Brow Pencil & Spoolie has a precision-angled tip that helps create definition and shape to your brows.
details: DetailsBenefitsFeatures a precision-angled tipShapes & shades with the edge of the tipFills & outlines with the point of the tipItem 2578278IngredientsMacadamia: Rhus Verniciflua Peel Wax, Hydrogenated Coco-Glycerides, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax (Cera Carnauba, Cire De Carnauba), Beeswax (Cera Alba, Cire D'Abeille), C10-18 Triglycerides, Stearic Acid, Microcrystalline Wax (Cera Microcristallina, Cire microcristalline), Silica, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, BHT. May Contain: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140).

reviews.headline: Best
reviews.comments: Best lip liner

reviews.headline: I would buy this again
reviews.comments: It goes on very smooth and stays on for a long time. My favorite color is Mocha

reviews.headline: Great long lasting color
reviews.comments: At 71 years old, I have tried many many different eyebrow products. Once I went gray I was trying to find something that could fill in my eyebrows but last all day, but not look like a marker. This fits the bill perfectly . easy to use different sizes for everyone, but it lasts so long but looks natural. I would highly recommend this

reviews.headline: Replaced my It Cosmetics Brow pencil
reviews.comments: I had been using the Universal Taupe by It cosmetics for years.  I tried the Latte shade in this (I am blonde) and I really like this just as much.  I like that the pencil is a bit finer.  But the Morphe Micro brow pencil is too thin for me.

reviews.headline: My favorite
reviews.comments: I love this eyebrow pencil so much. It comes out thin so I have more control to fill in my eyebrows. Its creamy and long lasting.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: This Pencil is terrific.  It's easy to apply and remove.  The color is a perfect match for my skin tone.  I LOVE it!

reviews.headline: Love this pencil!
reviews.comments: Good color, goes on smooth, really like the shape. It's small for lines or shading.

reviews.headline: Good product, cheap packaging
reviews.comments: I've bought this pencil 3 times, and love the product. The color is great and long-lasting. However, everytime I get it, the lids don't stay on after a few weeks of use. The last one I bought actually broke into 2 pieces with normal use. So, now I just have a sad little pencil without a lid or brush. I won't be buying it again, unfortunately.

reviews.headline: As good as it gets
reviews.comments: Love this pencil so much! Switched from Benefit Precisely, MBP in 3.5 to this in Cold Brew. Just as good if not better and, like, a third of the cost. Holy Grail and the shade selection is stellar.

reviews.headline: My go to eye brow pencil!
reviews.comments: Ive been purchasing this specific morphe eye brow pencil for i believe over 7 years now. Its my go-to and jt never disappoints! I love the shape of the tip, and it blends well when using the brush end. Lasts all day and easy to wipe off to make corrections when applying. And so affordable too!

reviews.headline: great Brow Pencil
reviews.comments: this brow pencil works so good... But very little product I do minimal just fill spots and doesnt last i have to buy way to often

reviews.headline: Barely any product
reviews.comments: I really like this brow pencil and the formula but I hate how there is literally no product. I only used this pencil for like 4 days and on day 5 I was surprised to see how there was absolutely no product left. I'm someone who does full glam often and in turns of formula, this is really good but it's something I cannot keep buying every 5 days.

reviews.headline: Love this
reviews.comments: I need to put this on auto buy because it is a staple in my makeup. It defines my brows beautifully!

reviews.headline: I would and have bought this pencil before
reviews.comments: It is amazing and since you do not have a store located in Canada (wish you did) or at least able to order online so it could be shipped here every time I make a trip to Grand Forks or Fargo I always stop by to restock. It is a fantastic brow pencil and do not use anything else.

reviews.headline: AMAZING
reviews.comments: love love love.  The best I have tried and the most affordable too.

reviews.headline: Works great!
reviews.comments: It does what it's supposed to. Holds well and glides on easily.

reviews.headline: I wouldn't buy this product again broke off when I try to ap
reviews.comments: Broke off when I tried to apply

reviews.headline: I buy this product always
reviews.comments: Love it, This is my forever brow pencil.

reviews.headline: I will buy again
reviews.comments: I buy this brow pencil over and over basically because of the angled pencil tip and I am satisfied with the color I perfer and the brush is there if I chose to use it. And it is hard to find sometimes.

reviews.headline: Love this!
reviews.comments: After losing my eyebrows to chemo a couple of years ago, my eyebrows never really grew back in.  This is an easy very thin eyebrow pencil that lasts all day and I love the twist up feature.

properties.name: Cons

values.label: Formula is dry and doesn't show up well.

display_values: Formula is dry and doesn't show up well.

properties.name: Pros

values.label: Creamy, easy to use, long lasting

display_values: Creamy, easy to use, long lasting

media.headline: It's my go to brow pencil
media.caption: After an entire day out.

media.headline: It's my go to brow pencil
definitely recommended
media.caption:
With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.
- Eleanor Roosevelt

faceoff_positive.comments: I haven't had the chance to use it on the daily just because I don't do a lot for work. However I have swatched it multiple times and color is very rich and pigmented. I love that it's smooth but isn't waxy, and also isn't chalky. It's the perfect mix üòç the color is also AMAZINGGGG. It's hard for me to find a color because I have dark features and black hair but recently got highlights. I still got the darkest shade and it looks so natural and amazing!
faceoff_positive.headline: I love it!

faceoff_negative.comments: I liked the way the product applied, it was smooth and didn't tug on my eyebrow hairs like the Anastasia Beverly Hills definer does. However, the darkest shade was barely a medium, chocolate brown. Way too obvious compared to my almost black eyebrow hairs. Not a good color range for people who have dark hair.
faceoff_negative.headline: Darkest shade is barely a medium brown
